title: My level of Iman has dropped, what should I do? #Assim #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: sh my question is that U around maybe five or one two weeks ago I was like feeling boosted with Iman shik and suddenly I don't know if it's true my mind certainly went flat down I think Allah knows best I don't know what to do shik well you have to go to my YouTube channel and you have to search for videos that talks about increasing your Iman and I believe I have maybe few lectures and video clips where I give you steps to follow and inshallah if you do this you will restore your Iman and strengthen it
